name: SOLAR SYSTEM (itch) (ashutoshdevkota)
description:
I have created a simple model of solar system using Unity.

I have included the following celestial bodies:

  • Sun
  • Moon
  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Uranus
  • Neptune
  • Comets

Depending on your system and network speed the game may take a few more seconds to load. So please do be patient. Thanks!

Created By:

Ashutosh Devkota
